author: Ethan Gibson
comment: Only criticism is that there's no toggle for the date. As someone with a OLED screen it's a concern that the date area will eventually get burnt in.
title: Almost perfect

author: Nick Bryant
comment: After using this for 3 days straight, I noticed that the date does not update unless you swap to another face and come back. New one for me and my moto360!
title: What day is it?

author: Jude Limus
comment: Date doesn't automatically change to the next day and its annoying.. I had to switch to another face and back..
title: Date is a problem

author: Thomas Malenich
comment: Really wanted it but date is just too tiny..... look better if it wasn't there or choice to make bigger
title: Tried
